Optimal Viewing Experience

For the best experience with these interactive visualizations, we recommend viewing on a large screen (desktop or laptop) with a minimum width of 1200px. The visualizations are designed to take full advantage of screen space and may not display optimally on smaller devices.

SynesthesAI

Interactive Visualizations of Poetry generated by AI

About the Project

SynesthesAI is an exploration of the intersection between poetry, emotion, and interactive visualization. Each sketch in this collection offers a unique way to experience and interpret literary works through dynamic, responsive visual elements.

This project showcases the creative potential of AI in digital art. The workflow involved a human curator providing poems (with "The Road Not Taken" being the only poem suggested by the AI) and high-level prompts, while an AI assistant (Claude 3.5 Sonnet) took on the role of both creative and technical director. The AI made all artistic and technical decisions, from choosing visual metaphors and interactive elements to implementing the code that brings each visualization to life.
